column5: Gerritt is doing well and is at the top of his class in physical therapy.  He's getting it done!
I'm a G fan, I hope for the best
He's probably sucking the cute wimmin into doing his tests for him!!
Lol thanks guys! Thanks for all the well wishes  heading in for another MRI as I write this  G
Great to hear Gerritt !!! You will be all set to come up here to the kawarthas and come fishing with me in no time at all !!!!! Lol ... Cheers man
